attributes.title: OH MY GOD
attributes.review: I was FLOODED with pop up ads, racist and sexist content, homophobic content, (and EVEN PORN🤢🤢🤢) no wonder its +17 years old. I was just trying to get information on rallies and etc and learn more about his 2020 campaign and they kept asking me for money, and even made some sexual passes at me that made me REALLY UNCOMFORTABLE as a women. THIS IS AN AWFUL APP, DO NOT DOWNLOAD OR ELSE IT WILL DISRUPT STREAMING AND SOCIAL MEDIA SERVICES.

attributes.title: Poorly executed
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see what Donald had in store if he was elected again and there was very little information about any changes he wants to make i just seen a bunch of tweets making claims and allegations that only a small minded american would fall for. The app also kept closing out while i was scrolling and had multiple pop ups asking me to allow the app to access my location which is very distracting

attributes.title: Caused irreversible eye damage
attributes.review: After two seconds of downloading my eyes caught fire causing me permanent eye damage! I will never be the same again because of this! It doesn’t tell you about all the side affects and expects us not to hate! If this wasn’t already bad enough this horrible app caused my IQ to go down to zero! Please for your sake don’t get this app!

attributes.title: Beware - They don’t tell you what this app does
attributes.review: This app RUINED my life. i’m unsure how to explain what happened, it all went so fast. two months ago, i decided i wanted to show my allegiance to Trump and download the app to track him and his progress with the virus. however, the covid breakout was not the virus i should have been concerned with. this app MANUALLY DOWNLOADED MALWARE onto my phone. i have no idEA how it managed to do so, yes here i sit with my new iphone, one i bought because even the apple employees could not repair the last one after the damage the Trump app made. it started to text out TRUMP 2020 to all my contacts. ALL. MY. CONTACTS. including my own, extremely liberal mother. she literally disowned me. i cannot be more serious. i am now living in my car, regretting ever supporting this shallow husk of a man. good luck to anyone who uses it. i wish you the best.

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: all i wanted to do was to see what this man was up to for the up coming election. maybe he could gain my vote. forget that. the app would not open, ever since i downloaded it every other app would crash, i literally couldn’t do anything on my phone what so ever. i eventually had to delete it but after that i had to completely restart my phone just so everything would work again. literally felt like my phone was about to explode with how hot this app made it get. you would think the person running the country would at least have a working app. a new born could do a better job than this, AND it would create a better app. i’d rather have a chimpanzee hyped up on adrenaline sitting in the oval office than this guy.

attributes.title: Fake News
attributes.review: Don’t know why they have to make everything about politics

attributes.title: Horrible Privacy Policy
attributes.review: This app serves no purpose but to collect your personal information. Unless you provide your email address you can’t use the app at all. Their privacy policy allows them to use your content. This is asking too much in my opinion.

attributes.title: Really disappointing
attributes.review: It was incredibly slow and glitched out a couple times

attributes.title: it smelled bad😻
attributes.review: i just wanted to see the app and what the ✨cheetos✨ plan for his election or whateva and it got it but my phone is doing something weird. like everything changed to trump 2020 and idk how to get my stuff back. you should definitely not get this app because you have no no way of making a difference to you and i was a really fun day at work but it is fun and it really really wanna was a really fun game it would really be nice 👍 is a good game but it’s really really fun but i don’t get to see it haha was a good good idea 💡 to all my friends and friends i i has always happened to me in my dreams.
